title: Woman in Motorized Wheelchair Facing Right

verbs: Depicts using or operating a motorized wheelchair.
nouns: A woman seated in a motorized wheelchair facing right, symbolizing accessibility or independence.

description: A woman shown seated in a motorized wheelchair, facing right. Represents accessibility, independence, and inclusivity for individuals with mobility challenges.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'woman in motorized wheelchair facing right' emoji shows a woman in a powered wheelchair rendered with realistic details, including visible wheels and a sleek chair frame. The design reflects confidence and empowerment, emphasizing Apple‚Äôs commitment to accessibility and inclusion.
